titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Anna Morgan Ward Collection
titlestmt.subtitle: Reminiscences
titlestmt.author: lgg 19 October 1972: REV 3/31/78

did.head: COLLECTION SUMMARY

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: University of Kansas Kenneth Spencer Research LibraryKansas Collection

did.unittitle: Reminiscences of early Lawrence, St. Joseph, Missouri.

physdesc.extent: 5 leaves. Handwritten. Signed by the author.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHY of Anna Morgan Ward
bioghist.p: Anna Morgan Ward was the sister of Jonathan Flanders Morgan (1856-1938?), who at the time of his death was the oldest citizen born in Douglas County. Their father was in the first party of emigrants to come to Kansas.

userestrict.head: RESTRICTIONS on USE
userestrict.p: Spencer Library staff may determine use restrictions dependent on the physical condition of manuscript materials.

prefercite.head: PREFERRED CITATION
prefercite.p: Anna Morgan Ward Collection, Kansas Collection, RH MS P54, Kenneth Spencer Research Library, University of Kansas

acqinfo.head: ACQUISITION INFORMATION
acqinfo.p: Gift, disbound from a pamphlet prepared by Watson Library, dated 1943
